Impact details

When you email your colleagues or invite them to meetings, you take time out of their schedules. This shows how much time you imposed on your coworkers compared to their average.

1 day without after-hours work
1.7hours imposed
3.5 peer average

Be aware of how much of your colleagues time you are taking.
